about_the_game:
Creepmoon is a SF roguelike in a 2D top-down pixel look. After a crash landing on a free drifting moon you must enter an underground complex teeming with giant creepy-crawlies. While roaming the complex, you use the explosives of the decentralized self-destruct system to get rid of the creatures. You also find out what purpose the prepared moon serves.

Genre


This is a roguelike with permadeath, so it's all about survival. However, you can unlock some levels as starting levels. The game is fair: if you prepare well and proceed carefully, you have the best chances.
You won't have any firearms, only grenades, booby traps, etc. that you craft from items you find.
The game pauses when you are looking at the map, but not when you are busy with your equipment. When tidying up or crafting, you have to be careful.

Visuals


The game has a top-down 2D view. The levels have a low-res pixel look, while the menus and HUD are displayed in normal resolution.
In places there may be total darkness, but you can procure light sources.

Physics


Physics plays a major role, not least in the effect and depiction of explosions. Smoke spreads and partially obscures your view. Objects and carcass parts are pushed away. You can find cover behind pillars and corners.

content_descriptors.notes:
In all levels of the game you can see how giant bugs, spiders, lizards and the like are killed by explosions. An excessive amount of red blood splatters around and body parts of these animals are severed. These remains of the animals remain permanently in the level.
The processes are physically realistic, but are depicted using low-res pixel graphics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: any x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
